Detailed Description

An abstract base class for all scene graph nodes.

Member Function Documentation

void addAnimationTrack ( AnimationTrack *  animation_track  )  [virtual]

Adds the given AnimationTrack to this Object3D, potentially changing the order and indices of the previously added tracks.

Reimplemented from Transformable.

Reimplemented in Camera, Light, MorphingMesh, and Sprite3D.

void align ( Node *  reference  ) 

Applies alignments to this Node and its descendants.

int animate ( int  world_time  )  [virtual]

Updates all animated properties in this Object3D and all Object3Ds that are reachable from this Object3D.

Reimplemented from Transformable.

Reimplemented in Camera, Light, Mesh, MorphingMesh, Sprite3D, and World.

Member Data Documentation

const int NONE = 144 [static]

Specifies for the setAlignment method that no alignment should be done for the specified axis.

const int ORIGIN = 145 [static]

Specifies the origin of the reference node as an orientation reference for the setAlighnment method.

const int X_AXIS = 146 [static]

Specifies the X axis of the reference node as an orientation reference for the setAlignement method.

const int Y_AXIS = 147 [static]

Specifieds the Y axis of the reference node as an orientation reference for the setAlignment mehotd.

const int Z_AXIS = 148 [static]

Specifieds the Z axis of the reference node as an orientation reference for the setAlignment mehotd.
